raw_data.raw_string: 17 July 2017, received £8,000 from the Mindfulness Initiative, a registered charity hosted by the Oxford Mindfulness Centre, POWIC Building, Warneford Hospital, Oxford OX3 7JX, for consultancy undertaken before my re-election as an MP. Hours: none since my re-election. (Registered 08 August 2017)
